import React from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Moviedetails = () => { const params=useParams(params.id); const getmoviedata=async()=> { const res=await axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=872b6f6702d22707bd5586523dc92a11&language=ar-US") setMoviess(res.data) } return (
) } export default Moviedetails
